cars.description: This is an immaculate 2006 Nissan Rogue with only 25000 miles on it. Leather seats, power everything.
This car has been in the family for many years. It is time for it to have a new owner. 236,000 miles and it still runs like a charm.
This is an ultimate comfort car. Lots of room for stuff and people. Get on this deal now!
Want to be the talk of the town? This baby has a lot of power and cuteness.
This is the ultimate luxury car. Looks brand new even with 189,350 miles.
This is the car you've dreamt of as a kid. Looks great, feels great.
